page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: A WIDE RANGE OF FARMING ACTIVITIES ARE UNDERTAKEN, RANGING FROM SHEEP ON THE HIGH MOORLAND TO CALF AND PIG REARING AND ARABLE LAND. OFTEN FARMS HAVE BEEN JOINED TOGETHER SUCH AS AT AYSDALE GATE FARM AND TIDKIN HOW FARM, WHERE BEEF CATTLE, SHEEP AND ARABLE FARMING IS UNDERTAKEN. ROUND CLOSE IS A SHEEP FARM AND THE SHEPHERD OCCUPIES THE FARMHOUSE, AND LOCKWOOD BECK FARM IS GRAZING LAND AND A POULTRY FARM WITH NO POULTRY AT PRESENT. THE FARMS AT STANGHOW ARE ALSO VARIED. RIDGE FARM IS ARABLE LAND WITH PIGS, SHEEP AND CATTLE. PLUM TREE FARM HAS A DAIRY HERD AND WELL FARM REARS CALVES AND PIGS. HOME FARM HAS SHEEP AND PIGS AND SEATON HOUSE FARM IS ARABLE LAND WITH SUCKLERS.
